Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerMtoV, IControllerVtoM
public class Controller extends Object implements IControllerVtoM, IControllerMtoV
Controller class implementing both IControllerVtoM and IControllerMtoV interfaces. Manages communication between the view and model components of the simulation, handling user interactions from the UI and updating the view with model data.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Sets up initial queue sizes for all service point types.

      Sets the UI component for this controller.
      Parameters:
      ui - The simulator UI instance

    • startSimulation

      public void startSimulation()
      Starts the simulation with the current configuration. Creates a new engine, sets simulation parameters, and starts the simulation thread.
      Specified by:
      startSimulation in interface IControllerVtoM

    • pauseSimulation

      public void pauseSimulation()
      Pauses the running simulation. Updates UI button states and sets the engine to paused state.

    • resumeSimulation

      public void resumeSimulation()
      Resumes a paused simulation. Updates UI button states and sets the engine to resume execution.

    • decreaseSpeed

      public void decreaseSpeed()
      Decreases the simulation speed by increasing the delay between simulation steps.

      public void resetSimulation()

    • saveConfiguration

      public void saveConfiguration()
      Saves the current simulation configuration. Saves the configuration to a properties file with the specified name.

    • loadConfiguration

      public void loadConfiguration()
      Loads a saved simulation configuration. Loads the configuration selected in the ComboBox.

    • deleteConfiguration

      public void deleteConfiguration()
      Deletes the selected configuration.

      public void showEndTime(double time)
      Shows the simulation end time in the UI. Updates the results label with formatted time value.
      Specified by:
      showEndTime in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:

    • updateTimeLeft

      public void updateTimeLeft(int secondsLeft)
      Updates the time left display in the UI. Called by the engine to provide real-time estimates.
      Specified by:
      updateTimeLeft in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      secondsLeft - Estimated seconds left, or -1 if still calculating

    • customerCreated

      public void customerCreated(Customer customer)
      Notifies the UI that a new customer has been created. Adds the customer to tracking and updates the visualization.
      Specified by:
      customerCreated in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      customer - The newly created customer

    • customerMoved

      public void customerMoved(int customerId, ServicePointType from, ServicePointType to)
      Notifies the UI that a customer has moved from one service point to another. Updates the visualization to show the customer's new position.
      Specified by:
      customerMoved in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer that moved
      from - The service point type the customer moved from
      to - The service point type the customer moved to

    • customerCompleted

      public void customerCompleted(int customerId, ServicePointType type)
      Notifies the UI that a customer has completed service and is leaving the system. Removes the customer from visualization and updates queue sizes.
      Specified by:
      customerCompleted in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer that completed service
      type - The service point type the customer was at when completing service
